summary: This is an FBI Miami request to the Bureau of Prisons for information on two inmates: Steven Hoffenberg and Berry Lester Kessler. The request seeks details on their custody dates, facility assignments, release dates, and death information, as part of an ongoing investigation.

persons.name: Steven Hoffenberg
persons.context: Listed as a current or former BOP inmate (BOP number 35601-054) about whom the FBI Miami is requesting information as part of an ongoing investigation.

persons.name: Berry Lester Kessler
persons.context: Listed as a current or former BOP inmate (BOP number 61264-061), believed to be deceased, about whom the FBI Miami is requesting information as part of an ongoing investigation.

persons.name: Alfredo Rodriguez
persons.context: Mentioned in the case details line ('SEE SUB Details: 72-MM-113327'), likely the agent associated with the case number referenced.

events.title: FBI Information Request to BOP
events.description: FBI Miami sends a formal request to the Bureau of Prisons Office of General Counsel for information on inmates Steven Hoffenberg and Berry Lester Kessler.

keyFacts: The FBI Miami was actively investigating Steven Hoffenberg and Berry Lester Kessler as of October 2010.
Berry Lester Kessler was believed to be deceased at the time of the request.
The request sought comprehensive BOP records including custody dates, facility history, and release/death information.
The document is part of case number 72-MM-113327, associated with Alfredo Rodriguez.
